archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.4.6a: a) revising project plans/resources if security requirements are not being met effectively (e.g. by changing or adding staff, amending plans, delaying timescales or revising costs)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
